subject: Education
title: Collaborative Learning in Digital Spaces
description: Learn Collaborative Learning in Digital Spaces in one minute.

hook.text: Wikipedia was built by strangers collaborating online. Can students learn the same way?

discovery.text: Peer instruction online can match expert teaching effectiveness when activities are well structured.

punchline.text: Collaboration doesn't happen by default. It has to be designed.

quiz.question: What is the biggest challenge with online collaborative learning?
options: Without clear roles, work often falls to one person in the group
